alert.note: Alert for Humacao; Las Piedras; San Lorenzo; Yabucoa (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 02 at 11:32PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM AST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following , Humacao, Las Piedras, San Lorenzo and Yabucoa. * WHEN...Until 145 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Dangerous flows over low-water crossings. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1032 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 4 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Humacao; Las Piedras; San Lorenzo; Yabucoa
